place_down_lid.description: Place the lid back down onto the TrashCan.

leave_lid_closed.description: Leave the lid in a closed position.

press_foot_pad.description: Press the foot pad to open the TrashCan lid.

pick_up_trashcan.description: Pick up the TrashCan by the handle.

put_down_trashcan.description: Place the TrashCan back down by the handle.

wipe_trashcan.description: Wipe the TrashCan body to clean it.

clean_whole_trashcan.description: Clean the entire TrashCan, including the lid, foot pad, handle, and body.
